node.text: I've a bad feeling about all this.~ The threat is not over. Mark my words.~ We're not safe yet. I can feel it.~ This resolution is not to my liking...
I remain wary, but there is no question that Bey Lah thrives, even with open borders.~ Live and drink.~ Live and drink, kendren.~ Oh, it is you. Stay safe.
I am uncomfortable with change, but it is a skill to train like any other.~ Live and drink.~ Live and drink, kendren.~ I hope Hindriarch Esk can keep us safe.

Live and drink, kendren.~ I will do my best to be civil with you, kendren, but we hindren are bred into wariness.~ Cause no trouble here, kendren.~ Be kind, kendren. We are watching you.~ Why do you remain here? Please, finish your business.~ It feels strange to allow you to cross our borders unimpeded, but Grand-Doe wills it.~ No good can come of allowing kendren into Bey Lah...
